(nation park) locat san benito counti &amp; monterey county, california, unit state nearest&#160;c soledad, california coordin 36°29′13″n 121°10′01″w﻿ / ﻿36.48694°n 121.16694°w﻿ / 36.48694; -121.16694coordinates: 36°29′13″n 121°10′01″w﻿ / ﻿36.48694°n 121.16694°w﻿ / 36.48694; -121.16694 area 26,606 acr (10,767&#160;ha)[1] creat january&#160;10,&#160;2013&#160;(2013-january-10) visitor 224,476 (in&#160;2012)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic pinnacl nation park u.s. nation park protect mountain area locat east salina valley central california, 5 mile (8.0&#160;km) east soledad 80 mile (130&#160;km) southeast san jose. park' namesak erod leftov western half extinct volcano move 200 mile (320&#160;km) origin locat san andrea fault, embed portion california pacif coast ranges. pinnacl manag nation park servic major park protect wilderness. nation park divid rock format east west divisions, connect foot trails; road connect east west entranc park. east side shade water, west high walls. rock format provid spectacular pinnacl attract rock climbers. park featur unusu talu cave hous least thirteen speci bat. pinnacl often visit spring fall intens heat summer months. park land prime habitat prairi falcons, releas site california condor hatch captivity. pinnacl nation monument establish 1908 u.s. presid theodor roosevelt. pinnacl nation park creat former pinnacl nation monument legisl pass congress late 2012 sign law presid barack obama januari 10, 2013. content 1 histori 1.1 nation monument 1.2 nation park statu 2 geographi climat 3 geolog 4 ecolog 4.1 anim 4.2 veget 5 hain wilder 6 activ 7 see also 8 note refer 9 bibliographi 10 extern link history[edit] nativ american pinnacl region compris chalon mutsun group ohlon people, left stone artifact park. nativ peopl declin arriv spanish 18th century, brought novel diseas chang natives' way life. last chalon die depart area 1810. 1810 1865, first anglo-american settler arrived, pinnacl region wilder without human use habitation.[3] establish spanish mission soledad hasten area' nativ depopul diseas dispersion. archaeolog survey found thirteen site inhabit nativ americans, twelv post-dat establish missions. one site believ 2000 year old.[4] 1880 pinnacles, known palisades, visit picnick surround commun would explor cave camp.[5] first account pinnacl region appear print 1881, describ balconi area.[6] 1889 1891, newspap articl shift describ excurs "palisades" call "pinnacles."[7] interest area rose point hollist free lanc sent report pinnacles, follow two month later parti local officials.[8] investor came san francisco consid place resort hotel there, specul came nothing. 1894 post offic establish bear valley. schuyler hain postmaster. sinc least one bear valley california, post offic name "cook" mrs. hain' maiden name.[9] 1924 post offic renam "pinnacles." schuyler hain homestead arriv pinnacl area 1891 michigan, follow parent eight sibl bear valley.[10] cousin, a.w. white, student stanford university, white brought one professor see pinnacl 1893. dr. gilbert impress scenery, comment inspir hain public region.[11] hain led tour bear valley caves, advoc preserv pinnacles. hain' effort result 1904 visit stanford presid david starr jordan, contact fresno congressman jame c. needham. jordan needham turn influenc gifford pinchot advoc establish pinnacl forest reserv presid theodor roosevelt. roosevelt proclaim establish juli 8, 1906.[12] pinchot, primarili interest manag forest product use rather preservation, advoc use recent pass antiqu act design scenic core area pinnacl nation monument, done roosevelt januari 16, 1908. design nomin pass control pinnacl depart agricultur depart interior,[13] u.s. forest servic retain effect control area circa 1911.[14] effort promot pinnacles, hain becam convinc pinnacl "extraordinari mountain" describ captain georg vancouv pictur john syke book voyag discovery, document vancouv expedition. hain began refer mountain "vancouver' pinnacles," term pick sunset 1903 article. refer "vancouver' pinnacles" persist 1955, analysi syke pictur indic mountain describ vancouv actual locat near fort ord, within easi reach day trip describ vancouver.[15] nation monument[edit] first set asid part pinnacl forest reserv 1906, pinnacl sever differ feder manag agencies, rang u.s. forest servic gener land offic ultim nation park service. 1908 presid theodor roosevelt creat pinnacl nation monument power given antiqu act 1906. initi area design antiqu act 2,080 acr (840&#160;ha). forest servic relinquish control monument circa 1911, oper agenc yet exist receiv it.[14] drivabl road exist park commun like hollister. hollist booster campaign feder fund road-building. congressman everi a. hay made trip pinnacl 1913 part campaign road funds. 1914 primit road extend bear valley.[16] bear gulch reservoir pinnacl nation park servic final establish 1916, pinnacl consid signific enough command park servic resourc time.[17] meantime, mine claim disrupt access tradit picnic grounds. 1922, follow repeat plea local resid park servic action, w. b. lewis, superintend yosemit nation park, direct visit pinnacl report circumst park servic director stephen mather. lewi difficult trip stay 45 minutes, report includ recommend monument abandoned, sinc scenic section privat hands.[18] gener land office, administ land surround nation monument known monterey nation forest, also receiv complaints, decemb 1922 j.h. favorit glo made thorough report copi mather. favorit recommend public domain land consolid monument, caretak appoint local homestead. 1923 herman hermansen appoint caretaker, may 7, 1923 monument enlarg proclam presid warren g. harding.[19] mather final visit monument march 28, 1924.[20] proclamation, time calvin coolidge, enlarg monument juli 2, 1924, secur water sourc campsites,[21] follow direct complet survey now-2,973-acr (1,203&#160;ha) monument.[22] follow visit np assist director horac m. albright, money appropri build ranger' cabin,[23] complet 1929,[24] facil within cave improved. frank a. kittredge, park servic chief engin thoma chalmer vint, park servic landscap architect, conduct survey five-year improv plan 1927.[25] 1929 condemn proceed file privat landown around park, includ mine company, seek 1,286.27 acr (520.54&#160;ha). expans proclam presid herbert hoover ad 1,926.35 acr (779.57&#160;ha) 1931 land donat san benito county.[26] trail-build expand earli 1930s, includ tunnel high peak trail.[27] view high peak trail 1933 civilian conserv corp camp establish 200 men work addit trail network.[28][29] lengthi legal proceedings, old mine claim incorpor monument 1958.[30] ccc labor improv road bear gulch, built tourist cabins,[31] construct dam bear gulch reservoir.[32] fire lookout built ccc chalon peak 1935, destroy fire 1951 replac frame structur follow year. park' visitor center headquart built 1936-37 local stone. superintendent' resid start 1941 complet 1949.[33] mission 66 project ad land new projects, emphasi develop previous undevelop west side park.[28][34] 1975 park compris 16,721 acr (6,767&#160;ha), grow present 26,606 acr (10,767&#160;ha) seri addit includ 2,000-acr (810&#160;ha) pinnacl ranch.[35] recent addit pinnacl nation monument presid bill clinton' proclam 7266 increas size monument 7,900 acr (32&#160;km2) includ caves.[36] nation park status[edit] legisl author rep. sam farr (d-california)[37] make pinnacl nation monument nation park pass unit state senat decemb 30, 2012, pass hous june 2012. bill also design present pinnacl wilder hain wilder commemor schuyler hain' effort establish nation monument.[37][38] legisl sign presid barack obama thursday, januari 10, 2013. chang design chang park' status, management, purpose. congress specifi 1970 gener author act 1978 redwood act[39] unit nation park system treat equal status, regardless title. pinnacl ninth unit nation park system california name nation park.[40] geographi climate[edit] entranc balconi cave pinnacl nation park pinnacl nation park lie 40 mile (64&#160;km) inland pacif ocean 80 mile (130&#160;km) south san francisco bay area. park southern portion gabilan range, part california' coast ranges. elev within boundari rang 824 feet (251&#160;m) 3,304 feet (1,007&#160;m) peak north chalon peak. climat mediterranean (köppen: csa/csb), unusu kind extrem diurnal temperatur variation. winter moder rainfall, mild high cold lows, summer extrem dri hot day cool nights. santa lucia mountain lie park pacif ocean, block ocean’ moder influenc diurnal temperatur swings. comparison nearbi coast, temperatur much larger daili rang averag 30 50&#160;°f (16.7 27.8&#160;°c) depend season. averag rainfal 17 inch (430&#160;mm) per year. snow fall small amount higher elev mid-decemb january. nation weather servic cooper weather station park headquarters. averag januari temperatur maximum 60.8&#160;°f (16.0&#160;°c) minimum 32.7&#160;°f (0.4&#160;°c).[41] averag juli temperatur maximum 95.5&#160;°f (35.3&#160;°c) minimum 50.3&#160;°f (10.2&#160;°c).[41] record high temperatur 116&#160;°f (47&#160;°c) juli 15, 1972.[41] record low temperatur 10&#160;°f (−12&#160;°c) januari 2, 1960, decemb 22, 1990.[41] averag annual precipit 16.55 inch (420&#160;mm). wettest calendar year 1983 35.80 inch (909&#160;mm) driest 1947 6.08 inch (154&#160;mm).[41] precipit one month 10.56 inch (268&#160;mm) march 1983.[41] precipit 24 hour 4.74 inch (120&#160;mm) februari 3, 1998.[41] snowfal one month 7.0 inch (18&#160;cm) januari 1962.[41] park lie within california interior chaparr woodland ecoregion. veget 80% chaparr woodlands, riparian grassland merg chaparral. divers intersect ecosystem altitud led great number anim speci call park home. climat data pinnacl nation park month jan feb mar apr may jun jul aug sep oct nov dec year record high °f (°c) 86 (30) 86 (30) 93 (34) 100 (38) 106 (41) 112 (44) 116 (47) 115 (46) 114 (16.3) 77.0 (25) averag low °f (°c) 27.0 (−2.8) 29.4 (−1.4) 31.5 (−0.3) 32.9 (0.5) 37.2 (2.9) 40.8 (4.9) 44.6 (7) 44.6 (7) 41.8 (5.4) 36.3 (2.4) 30.9 (−0.6) 26.7 (−2.9) 35.3 (1.8) record low °f (°c) (normals, 1981–2010)[42] sourc #2: western region climat center (extrem 1937–present)[41] geology[edit] park locat near san andrea fault, hand creat uniqu format park protects. pinnacl part neenach volcano erupt 23 million year ago near present-day lancaster, california. movement pacif plate along san andrea fault split section rock main bodi volcano move 195 mile (314&#160;km) northwest. believ pinnacl came particular volcano due uniqu breccia found elsewher neenach volcano formations. differenti eros weather expos rock creat pinnacl seen today.[43] rock format andesit rhyolite, form drop fault block embed gabilan range.[44] large-scal earth movement also creat talu cave found park. deep, narrow gorg shear fractur transform cave larg chunk rock fall wedg crack leav open area below.[43] sinc pinnacl move area, san andrea fault shift 4 mile (6.4&#160;km) east park. origin locat san andrea seen chalon creek fault. two larg fault known run park, miner' gulch pinnacl faults. fault parallel san andrea like caus major movement main fault.[43] establish rel movement pinnacl neenach rock signific factor accept plate tecton geology.[44] seismic activ frequent park unit state geolog survey maintain two seismomet within boundaries. evid past ongo seismic activ seen offset stream cross faults. valley bottom terrac show sign uplift.[43] ecology[edit] map pinnacl nation park also see resolut adjust pdf map animals[edit] prairi falcon breed area highest densiti anywher north america. peregrin falcon recent return park breed also, far fewer numbers. california condor re-establish program place sinc 2003. first nest sinc reintroduct built 2010, pinnacl manag popul 25 free-fli condors.[45][46] bobcats, cougars, coyotes, california quail, wild turkey, mani bird mammal live area.[47] formerli nativ animals, vanish central california, includ tule elk pronghorn antelope.[48] grizzli black bear area end 19th century.[49] like mani park central california, pinnacl small problem wild pig (a mix feral domest pig import wild boars) disturb landscap regular basis. spring 2006, core park pig free. culmin twenty-year, 1.6 million dollar effort succeed erad pig main area park. nation park servic personnel along iw work remov pig insid park, establish monitor exclusionari pig fenc run approxim 26 mile (42&#160;km) around center core park. outsid fence, however, wild pig still roam regular abundance. current monitor potenti break breach fenc need ensur pig return devast park.[50] thirteen speci bat document pinnacles, three speci consid likely. park' talu cave provid roost breed habitat bats.[51] 1990 student biologist, olivia messinger, censu bee pinnacles. found park bee per unit area know of, anywher els earth, around 400 species. bee solitari bees, live coloni like european honeybees, live three four weeks. sinc flower bloom throughout grow season, mani nich bee species. interest five-minut video found sfnps.org/be [52] vegetation[edit] warmer portion park, larg area greasewood cover slopes, along manzanita, gray pine, canyon live oak blue oak. cooler portion park higher proport pine oaks, togeth california buckeye, hollyleaf cherri coffeeberry. willow elderberri found along intermitt streams. fire domin influenc region' flora, natur caus intent intervent people. region inhabit nativ american use fire tool encourag growth prefer food sources, herd small game hunting. sinc disappear nativ peopl hill becom brushier.[53] hain wilderness[edit] 80% (15,985 acr 6,469 hectares) park design hain wilder (known 2013 pinnacl wilderness). wilder design provid even higher protect rock spire give pinnacl name, well south chalon peak, second highest peak park. wilder includ creek canyon habitat endang red-leg frog.[54] unit state congress 1976 enact public law 94-567, ad pinnacl wilder sever other nation wilder preserv system.[55] activities[edit] section high peak trail although road approach park west soledad east empti land south hollister, road connect park. develop area east side park.[56] sever trail day hikers, strenuous. primarili march april, wide varieti wildflow display, except year extrem drought. trail provid view surround hill valley clear days. san andrea fault visibl vantag along trails. park includ well known hike portion known among enthusiast simpli "the pig fence". portion south wilder trail challeng stretch strenuou hike time requir use fence, erect prevent feral pig enter park, help oneself climb steepli pitch trail. trail includ lush wildflow accent view along flat stream beds, trail bring one beauti caves, trail involv high vista pinnacl formations. park popular advanc rock climber due mani difficult challeng climbs.[57] cave pinnacl talu caves, form steep, narrow canyon fill boulders, leav passag larger rocks.[58] bear gulch east side park balconi cave west side season open visitors. cave hous breed coloni townsend' big-ear bat close pup season. cave may flood time high water.[59] camp facil avail east side pinnacl campground.[60] see also[edit] state rout 25 state rout 146 tre pinos, california trona pinnacles&#160;— southern california near ridgecrest trona.
